VIII.ii.2.C.3.a
.
Special Provisions Regarding the Evaluation of Respiratory Conditions
The rating activity must consider the provisions of
38 CFR 4.96
when granting entitlement to SC for certain respiratory disabilities.  These provisions include
prohibitions for separately evaluating certain coexisting respiratory conditions
entitlement to special monthly compensation in specific cases, and
requirements for pulmonary function tests.
Reference
:  For more information on evaluating respiratory disabilities, see
38 CFR 4.97
, and
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, 4.A
.
